text: hi I'm Helen I was born and grew up in
Vietnam my love for food studied at a
very young age from the cooking games
that my younger sister and I played
together in Vietnam
after a decade living overseas in
Singapore and then Germany I got even
more object with Vietnamese food because
I really miss them when I was over there
and I simply didn't forget nummies food
and obviously food cause the more
exposed I was to international cuisine
the stronger my desires will to revive
the traditional and authentic Vietnamese
food
my philosophy is very simple recipes
should be shared and make easy so
everyone can cook and enjoy them at home
join me here every Friday where I share
recipes of delicious Vietnamese food for
free subscribe now
